Bardic Inspiration

Inspire an ally to add a +1d6 bonus to their next Attack Roll, Ability Check or Saving Throw.

At Bard Level 5, the Bardic Inspiration bonus increases to +1d8. At Bard Level 10, the Bardic Inspiration bonus increases to +1d10.
